content: ready to crochet something adorable check out my free pattern for this cute pet pig easy to crochet this project uses super bulky yarn and a 7 mm hook this little piggy was designed as part of the 7th annual cal central crochet softie crochet along visit marie s post for all the other patterns we ve released as part of this event here https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/03/18/2024-softie-crochet-along/ 1 the free pattern will be available on my website beginning on june 10 2024 at 1 00 am est > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my ravelry pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/03/18/2024-softie-crochet-along/
